meanings.definition: A method of analyzing data from multiple studies to draw conclusions
meanings.sent1: In the metanalysis of the research papers, the scientists found common trends.
meanings.sent2: Researchers used metanalysis to compare the findings of various experiments.
meanings.sent3: The metanalysis of the studies revealed some unexpected patterns.
meanings.sent4: The metanalysis acted as a magnifying glass, revealing hidden connections in the data.
meanings.sent5: Through metanalysis, the researchers were able to uncover important insights from the data.

meanings.definition: The process of combining and analyzing results from various studies
meanings.sent1: Metanalysis involves looking at different studies to find similarities.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use metanalysis to make sense of the data collected from multiple sources.
meanings.sent3: The metanalysis of the experiments was like putting together a puzzle.
meanings.sent4: Her approach to problem-solving was a metanalysis of ideas and concepts.
meanings.sent5: Through metanalysis, the researchers were able to piece together a comprehensive understanding.

meanings.definition: The statistical analysis of a collection of results from different studies
meanings.sent1: The metanalysis of the data sets provided valuable statistical insights.
meanings.sent2: Metanalysis helps in summarizing the statistical findings across studies.
meanings.sent3: The metanalysis of the surveys required careful attention to detail.
meanings.sent4: Her ability to conduct metanalysis of complex data sets was impressive.
meanings.sent5: Through metanalysis, the researchers were able to identify significant trends in the statistics.
